<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rites of Transfiguration](/Feats.aspx?ID=5017) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 190 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can adapt your patron’s power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims. Your familiar learns [_cursed metamorphosis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1479), even if _cursed metamorphosis_ isn’t on your tradition’s spell list. By spending 10 minutes in communion with your familiar, you can replace one spell of 6th-rank or higher you’ve prepared in one of your witch spell slots with a _cursed metamorphosis_ spell of the same rank.
name: Rites of Transfiguration
